workshoptitle: Use OCI Object Storage to Store Files in Oracle APEX Applications

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Create OCI Identity and Access Management Resources
tutorials.description: Create the required Identity and Access Management (IAM) user, group, policies, and setup OCI API keys.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Create OCI Resources for the Application
tutorials.description: Create the OCI resources for the application: Autonomous Database, Object Storage bucket, and an Oracle APEX Workspace and database schema.

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Create a Document Management Application
tutorials.description: Create an Oracle APEX application for document management.

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
